With her outstanding visual acuity, Jayde notices the battle first.  
She also notices who's involved.

"Hey, isn't that Megatron?" she queries.  "I thought he was all 
washed up."  The Rogues are well-informed about matters concerning 
their enemies - besides which, there's no way to keep the capture of 
such a notorious criminal a secret.

"Hmmm..." Riekan mulls it over as they draw closer to the conflict.  
"We'd better radio this in.  Riekan to Gatara, we've got a positive 
ID of a Predacon by the name of Megatron."

---

Gatara takes a moment to digest this news.  She reasons that Rogue 
Star, with its cloaking device and formidable defensive systems, 
could be safely left alone for a while.  However, someone ought to be 
around in case any crewmembers wake up.  She makes her decision.

"We'll need an ally of some kind, at least for the time being," she 
states.  "I'm on my way over there.  Don't shoot at anyone unless you 
know they're against Megatron.  Torin, keep an eye on things here."

As soon as her instructions are acknowledged, Gatara runs outside and 
takes off, cloaking herself out of habit.

OOC: The group already has beast forms from previous trips to present-
day Earth.

---

Phoenix paces inside her room.  There's no other word for it: she's 
BORED.  But when she hears Gatara thunder by her door on the way out, 
she realizes that there's only one other Rogue left on the ship.  Now 
would be her chance to escape, if she could just get the door 
unlocked ...
